description: The attorney representing Uvalde families announced several new lawsuits aimed at Meta, the manufacturer of video game “Call of Duty” and gunmaker Daniel Defense.
title: Uvalde parents are suing gunmaker, Meta and ‘Call of Duty’ manufacturer

description: “Distrust and verify” what AI searches and chatbots spit out. The technology can’t tell jokes from facts — and can invent confident-sounding answers.
title: Why Google’s AI might recommend you mix glue into your pizza

description: The story of NASA’s commercial crew program, the effort by NASA a decade ago to outsource human spaceflight to private companies in the wake of the retirement of the space shuttle, is a tale of contrast.
title: Boeing continues to struggle with spacecraft problems ahead of human flight

description: Rescued from a dog shelter, Kabosu was an enduring meme of the 2010s, her skeptical glance inspiring a new type of online lingo and a cryptocurrency.
title: Kabosu, side-eyeing Shiba inu who inspired the ‘doge’ meme, dies at 18
